pageErrors.errorNameNotUnique: A page with this name already exists
pageErrors.errorPathNotUnique: A path with this name already exists
pageErrors.errorStartingSlash: A path needs to start with a '/'
pageErrors.errorUniquePathParams: Path parameters have to be unique.

publishActionModal.title: Publish
publishActionModal.description: Take your app live by publishing to one of the domains. Note that your application can have multiple domains, each running a different version of the application.
publishActionModal.publishSucceedDescription: The site has been successfully published.
publishActionModal.publishFailedDescription: The site publishing has failed. Please try again later.
publishActionModal.noDomain: You need to have at least one domain in order to publish your application.

emptySidePanelState.message: Click on one of the elements to see more details

imageElementForm.altTextDescription: Is used by screen readers and displayed if the image can't load
imageElementForm.urlWarning: Note: please make sure that you have control over, or trust the url entered.

domainSettings.noDomainMessage: You have not yet associated a domain with this application. You must add a domain to be able to publish your application. You can publish different versions of your application for each domain listed here.

dnsStatus.description: Visit your domains' DNS settings and make the following changes

customDomainForm.invalidDomain: The provided domain name is invalid
customDomainForm.notUniqueDomain: The provided domain is already used

linkElementForm.paramsInErrorDescription: The saved parameters don't match the page parameters. The page has probably been deleted or updated.

pageSettings.title: Page
pageSettings.pageUpdatedDescription: The page settings have been updated.

pageForm.pathSubtitle: A parameter can be added via :parameter
pageForm.pathParamsSubtitle: Are defined by :parameter in the path
pageForm.pathParamsSubtitleTutorial: Path parameters can be used to dynamically load data, depending on the provided parameter. Add :parameter to the path to add one.

integrationSettings.title: Integrations
integrationSettings.noIntegrationMessage: You have not yet created any connection. They can be created by adding data source, action or user authentication.
integrationSettings.integrationMessage: You can create new integrations by adding data source, action or user authentication.

dataSourceForm.noIntegrations: you don't have any integration yet
dataSourceForm.errorUniqueName: Data source name must be unique.

dataSourceContext.noDataSourceTitle: You have not yet added a data
dataSourceContext.noDataSourceMessage: Data can be used to fetch from internal or external sources and display it on the page.

styleBoxForm.paddingError: The value must be an integer between 0 and 200.
